[http://geonames.usgs.gov/pls/gnispublic/f?p=gnispq:3:::NO::P3_FID:443137 443137] |website = |footnotes = }} '''Scott''' is a small [[unincorporated area|unincorporated town]] in [[Van Buren Township, LaGrange County, Indiana|Van Buren Township]], [[LaGrange County, Indiana|LaGrange County]], [[Indiana]].
==Geography== Scott is located at {{coord|41|44|30|N|85|33|22|W|city}} on the [[Pigeon River (St. Joseph River)|Pigeon River]] near the [[Indiana Toll Road]], just about a mile south of the state border with [[Michigan]].
